name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, the ITTF apologized to Chinese fans for selling tickets on September 18. The ITTF Fukuoka Finals tickets were sold on September 18, which was criticized by Chinese netizens as insulting China. The ITTF then issued a bilingual apology letter, saying that the foreign person in charge did not understand the background of the date, which caused serious concern and protests from Chinese fans, and that it would have zero tolerance for any behavior that hurt the feelings of the Chinese people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, the Economic Observer published an article titled "Food is a big problem for rural elderly people". The article pointed out that with the intensification of aging and hollowing out, the ability of rural areas to provide public services is weakening, the problem of elderly care is becoming increasingly serious, and more attention needs to be paid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a netizen’s post, a freshman majoring in materials physics at Harbin Engineering University called the Fukushima nuclear power plant during military training, harassed the staff several times, and posted the conversation process on TikTok. Previously, he had also harassed the staff of the Yasukuni Shrine by phone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics distributed mooncakes as Mid-Autumn Festival gifts to students on September 14. The total number of mooncakes purchased this time was 33,000, with a unit price of about 6 yuan, but the quality was very poor, and there was even no trademark or independent packaging, which was far from the Qiao Jiashan mooncakes distributed in previous years. Due to the poor quality of the mooncakes and excessive addition of saccharin, many students suffered from diarrhea. The distribution of mooncakes this time caused strong dissatisfaction among students, questioning whether the school leaders had profit transfer and corruption. This matter has attracted a lot of public attention on platforms such as Zhihu, Xiaohongshu, Douyin and Bilibili. The school is actively investigating and suppressing it, and even students in Australia have been threatened across borders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to the students' investigation, Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics issued a winning bid announcement on August 19, 2024, and Guangzhou Huangpu District Tiantianxuan Baking Co., Ltd. won the bid with 399,500 yuan. The company was established on June 22, 2024, and obtained a food business license on July 29 of the same year. On August 19, it won the bid for mooncake procurement. The company is controlled by Guo Ying, and Guo Zekai and Su Yajing (Guo Zekai studied at the School of Business Administration and the School of Humanities of Jiangxi University of Finance and Economics) are silent shareholders. After winning the bid, the company subcontracted the production of mooncakes to Wenzhou Taimei Food Technology Co., Ltd. The company was administratively punished twice for food safety issues (excessive colonies and excessive preservatives) in less than two years, and was associated with Tiantianxuan Baking Company, which is only 8 kilometers away from the community where Guo Zekai lives, both located in Cangnan, Wenzhou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, students from No. 5 Middle School in Dan County, Heze City, Shandong Province, made an appointment to fight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens contributed,
On September 8, a female student in a science and innovation class at Xiangdong Middle School chose to jump off a building because she could not bear the verbal abuse from her head teacher.
In the early stage, this incident did not cause widespread criticism of the school by students. After returning home that night, day students did not discuss the incident much, but some people tried to divert attention by discussing the camera issue, which aroused students' dissatisfaction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Fuzhou Minjiang University, at the request of the local police station, supervised students to download and register the National Anti-Fraud Center APP.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, an author posted a video on TikTok. The video content is that on May 11, 2021, Hua Chunying, a spokesperson for the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, responded to the "2021 Copenhagen Democracy Summit invited people from Taiwan and Hong Kong to speak" and said that the Chinese people's trust in the Chinese government has reached 98%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, the East Campus of Shenzhen High School did not suspend classes and let the boarding students go home after the typhoon warning was upgraded to yellow, while the central campus affiliated with the same group had already suspended classes. So the students began to curse Shenzhen High School East Campus in the dormitory.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the parent-child sports organization Zhongti Xinghui went bankrupt.
Within a few weeks, members in at least five places, including Suzhou and Shanghai, have held rights protection protests.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, Sima Nan dressed in ancient costume for a night tour of the Tang Dynasty City that Never Sleeps in Xi'an. During the tour, he tripped over the steps outside the restaurant, which sparked heated discussions among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Harbin, Heilongjiang. A student from Harbin Institute of Technology called the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant and insulted the operator, "Are you mentally retarded? Why are you discharging nuclear waste water into the sea?" After the call was hung up, the man called again and played the song "March of the Broadsword" again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, a screenshot of a notice from the food chain "Holiland" was circulated online, prohibiting employees from driving or riding motorcycles in any situation. The notice showed that recently an employee of the company died in an accident while driving a motorcycle during a break, so Holiland issued a notice and stated that if any employees still drive or ride motorcycles privately, the company has the right to terminate their labor contracts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 16, Typhoon Bebejia made landfall in Shanghai, one of the strongest typhoons to hit the city. Some deliverymen and couriers still insisted on working outdoors, and it was reported online that a deliveryman was hit by a fallen tree trunk and his life was in danger.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 14 (Released) Jiangsu. When a truck driver passed a highway weighbridge, he was told by the staff that the truck was overloaded. When the driver opened the door, there were only a few bags of snails in the cabin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 15, a netizen asked ByteDance's "Doubao AI" to write an ancient poem criticizing the delay in retirement. Ai replied, "Sorry, I can't answer your question." However, when the user asked AI to write a poem criticizing the delay in retirement in the United States, AI was able to generate an answer.
